Specification: On-chip memory: 64 KB ROM, 8 KB RAM, 2 KB data flash memory
Size: 53 mm x 85 mm; thickness: 11.5 mm
VCC: 3.3 V to 5.5 V. MCU operation voltage range 1.6 V to 5.5 V
USB connector: VBUS (5 V input); VBUS is converted to 3.3 V by LDO
Reset switch x 1; user switch x 1
Power indicator: green x 1, user: green x 2, On-board Debugger ACT LED: green x 1
Connector: 6-pin x 1, 8-pin x 2, 10-pin x 1 The interface is compatible with ArduinoTM UNO R3
